content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

 

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

 

CREATE VIEW [dmgold].[vtGLACCOUNTLINEITEMRAWDATA_AGGR]
AS SELECT 
f.[_key_IDEBITCREDITCODE],
f.[_key_ICOMPANYCODE],
f.[COMPANYCODECURRENCY],
f.[GLOBALCURRENCY],
f.[TRANSACTIONCURRENCY],
f.[_key_ILEDGER],
f.[_key_IPROFITCENTER],
f.[_key_ICHARTOFACCOUNTS],
f.[_key_ISEGMENT],
f.[_key_IGLACCOUNTINCHARTOFACCOUNTS],
f.[FISCALYEAR],
f.[FISCALPERIOD],
SUM([AMOUNTINCOMPANYCODECURRENCY]) AS [AMOUNTINCOMPANYCODECURRENCY],
SUM([AMOUNTINGLOBALCURRENCY]) AS [AMOUNTINGLOBALCURRENCY],
SUM([AMOUNTINTRANSACTIONCURRENCY]) AS [AMOUNTINTRANSACTIONCURRENCY]
FROM [dmgold].[I_GLACCOUNTLINEITEMRAWDATA] AS f
GROUP BY
f.[_key_IDEBITCREDITCODE],
f.[_key_ICOMPANYCODE],
f.[COMPANYCODECURRENCY],
f.[GLOBALCURRENCY],
f.[TRANSACTIONCURRENCY],
f.[_key_ILEDGER],
f.[_key_IPROFITCENTER],
f.[_key_ICHARTOFACCOUNTS],
f.[_key_ISEGMENT],
f.[_key_IGLACCOUNTINCHARTOFACCOUNTS],
f.[FISCALYEAR],
f.[FISCALPERIOD];
GO
